TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Enables you to pass context properties from the COM Transaction Integrator (COMTI) into the COM+ context.

remarks.format:
## Remarks COMTI provides services for accessing the IBM Customer Information Control System (CICS) and IBM Information Management System (IMS). Essentially, COMTI provides a set of tools and services that ease the task of wrapping mainframe transactions and business logic as COM components.
For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](../Topic/Extending%20Metadata%20Using%20Attributes.md).

Docs.param: if the COMTI context properties are passed into the COM+ context; otherwise, .
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, enabling the setting of the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute.Value%2A> property.
Gets a value indicating whether the COM Transaction Integrator (COMTI) context properties are passed into the COM+ context.
Docs.value: if the COMTI context properties are passed into the COM+ context; otherwise, . The default is .
